--0-655910865-1078112691=:19075
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Through a rift in space and time, a lone small spacecraft emerged.  It was really a fighter with a long range booster.  It came online and accessed the booster's long range sensors.  It detected several things: multiple bases planet side, and the looming Unicron in high orbit.  The craft banke, and made way for the far side of the planet, away from Unicron.  It skimmed across the atmosphere and then entered the atmosphere.  It was going to come down somewhee between all the bases.  After re-entry, the booster section jetisoned and the fighter spread its wings and touched off the engines.  It was then it detected the signal it was looking for.  It was coming fom a base with many Maximal signatures.
<I have found him!  At long last, I found him!>
It altered course and bee- lined for the Maximal base.  


"In the name of God, I banish these souls of the evil undead into damnation.  May God have mercy, for I have none.  In Jesus' Holy Name, Amen." -Rawl, Hellsing-RPG

<DIV>Through a rift in space and time, a lone small spacecraft emerged.  It was really a fighter with a long range booster.  It came online and accessed the booster's long range sensors.  It detected several things: multiple bases planet side, and the looming Unicron in high orbit.  The craft banke, and made way for the far side of the planet, away from Unicron.  It skimmed across the atmosphere and then entered the atmosphere.  It was going to come down somewhee between all the bases.  After re-entry, the booster section jetisoned and the fighter spread its wings and touched off the engines.  It was then it detected the signal it was looking for.  It was coming fom a base with many Maximal signatures.</DIV>
<DIV><I have found him!  At long last, I found him!></DIV>
<DIV>It altered course and bee- lined for the Maximal base.  </DIV><BR><BR>"In the name of God, I banish these souls of the evil undead into damnation.  May God have mercy, for I have none.  In Jesus' Holy Name, Amen." -Rawl, Hellsing-RPG<p><hr SIZE=1>
